My opponent decides to go off the book with a very unusual and I would say weak move: it blocks the dark squared bishop and hinders Queen's mobility. The LSB does not do much here either. Both DSB and the Queen would be passive for the rest of the game. More natural would be Bc4, Bd5 or d4.
